page.title: 18SCHOOL SPORTS.
page.content: Langwith Bassett Primary School has 60 pupils whose ages range from 4 to 11years.From the age of 7,pupils learn and practice a number of different sports during a weekly games period.In the Autumn and Spring terms the main games are football for the boys and netball and hockey for the girls.If the weather is unsuitable for outdoor activities,volleyball is played in the hall by teams of mixed boys and girls. Summer games are always played by mixed teams.Rounders,stoolball and padda tennis occupy the games periods.An annual school sports day in which the infants take part precedes an area sports day against teams from 7 other primary schools who take turns at hosting the events.Running,skipping,sack and obstacle races are contested.The first 3 in each event receive certificates.
